title: Technique Lesson
description: Our technique lessons are designed for advanced skiers and racers that want that edge to take their ski technique to the next level. Whether it’s skate or classic, you’ll receive an hour long session where we’ll specialize in whatever area of skiing you would like to improve. Debrief after the lesson and you’ll receive  video feed back from our instructors. Strap on those skis and get out there!
